title: Account not getting accessed
body: So basically, I have an account that is named NeverSkilled I tried doing the forget username thing and password now I have this account and I'm stumped because I have so much skins that cost alot of rp that I bought. It just says invalid password or username and stuff like that and I'm actually crying and super sad. Now this account is noob5678 and I'm sad. I've went on riot free points things and I'm regretting that. Please help soon. I really want my account back.

replies.body:
Oh noes! It sounds like you might be having problems with your password due to someone else having access to your account. Sometimes when people 'hack' other accounts, they might change the password/email to try and keep the original owner from getting it back. 

We can help get your account back if you reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Be sure that you stay logged out of all accounts when you send us that ticket!
